title: iboss - Gateway Performance Metrics
description: This dashboard provides a comprehensive overview of gateway performance metrics

definition.content:
This dashboard provides a comprehensive overview of gateway performance metrics. 

For more information, see the [iboss Integration Documentation](https://docs.datadoghq.com/integrations/iboss/).

**Tips**
- Use the timeframe selector in the top right of the dashboard to change the default timeframe.
- Clone this dashboard to rearrange, modify and add widgets and visualizations.

**Note**
- This dashboard is populated using metrics. Please follow the Configuration steps [here](/integrations/iboss) to enable metrics collection. Ensure the `Collect gateway performance metrics` option is enabled to collect these metrics.
- Filters:
  - `reporter_node` applies to all widgets
  - `region` applies to widgets in `Region Insights` and `Summary` groups
  - `gateway` applies to widgets in `Gateway Insights` and `Summary` groups
